T02D2815:168b-0: @168b * // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po kun nas 'bar ba'i mtshan ma can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2815:168b-1: tadya th'a aom a'a:hr'i:badzra badzrodbha wa sarba dharmma ni /
T02D2815:168b-2: sva bh'a ba r'u pe ta garbha dindha dzva la dzval /
T02D2815:168b-3: pra ti dzva la pra ti dzva la ha na ha na pra ha na pra ha na /
T02D2815:168b-4: sarba ta th'a ga to tsitta sth'i ra h'um phat /
T02D2815:168b-5: lte dbus rta bdun 'bar ba nyid //
T02D2815:168b-6: hr'i: yig 'phros pas mtshams bsgoms la //
T02D2815:168b-7: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2815:168b-8: tshogs rdzogs rdo rje sgeg par blta //
T02D2815:168b-10: aa brjod bdag lus bzhu ba ni //
T02D2815:168b-11: rdo rje la bcug ho: brjod pas //
T02D2815:168b-12: kun du bskor zhing spang bar bya //
T02D2815:168b-13: lte bar h'um mtshan rtsa ba aa dang de bzhin ho //
T02D2815:168b-14: aa sogs ka sogs bde chen bdun pa'i yi ge'ang de mthar phreng ba'i tshul //
T02D2815:168b-15: sngags brjod rab zhi gdug pa'i sems skrag ye shes me lce 'bar //
T02D2815:168b-16: mi bzad sgra grag nam mkha'i ngos la ser sprin 'brug gi nga ro bzhin //
T02D2815:168b-17: rnal 'byor rgyal po gzi brjid che //
T02D2815:168b-18: thugs rje khros pas drag pa'i thugs //
T02D2815:168b-19: dpal ldan rnam par rgyal phyag 'tshal //
T02D2815:168b-20: dgra gdon sdig pa kun sel ba'o //
